Content: The fleeting winds of time, flying through each day. All the things I should've done, but time just slipped away. Remember seize the day. Life goes by in the blink of an eye, with so much left to say. These were the best of times, I'll miss these days. Your spirit lit my life each day. Thank you for the inspiration. Thank you for the smiles. All the unconditional love. That carried me for miles. It carried me for miles, but most of all, thank you for my life.
Author: Dream Theater
